recipes.name: Grilled Steak
recipes.instructions:
1. Season steak with salt and pepper
2. Heat grill to high
3. Grill steak 4 minutes each side
4. Add butter and garlic
5. Let rest 5 minutes
6. Slice and serve

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.instructions:
1. Wash and chop lettuce
2. Grill chicken if using
3. Toss lettuce with dressing
4. Add croutons
5. Top with parmesan
6. Add chicken slices
7. Serve fresh

recipes.name: Fish and Chips
recipes.instructions:
1. Cut potatoes into chips
2. Make beer batter
3. Coat fish in batter
4. Deep fry fish until golden
5. Fry chips until crispy
6. Serve with tartar sauce
